      • removeUserFromRoom

        public boolean removeUserFromRoom(int idUser,
                                  int idRoom)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.net.URISyntaxException
        Removes a user from a room. Only the creator can do this and they can't remove themself. Only not one-on-one rooms allow removing users.
        Parameters:
        idUser - to remove
        idRoom - to remove from
        Returns:
        true if removed, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if exception occurs
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if uri is malformed
